content.rendered:
eCheck Processing

Leading eCheck payment processing services in Los Angeles

Replace the need for paper checks with the best eCheck processing service in Los Angeles. 

Free Quote
Contact Sales

If you process recurring transactions, such as bill payments, auto payments, and rent, use eCheck processing to get paid faster and with lower transaction fees than alternatives

Accept eChecks for purchases where you might accept a paper check.

Contact Sales

Easily manage bill payments and other recurring payments

A leading eCheck processing company.

When a customer provides their bank account information, you can now process the transaction electronically. Reduce administrative costs and processing time.

eCheck fees are generally less than debit and credit card transactions. Use the eCheck payment process whenever you have recurring transactions and want to save money.

Merchant Services in
Los Angeles

Whether you are processing payments in-store, online, or keyed in a virtual terminal, you’ll get the best rates with Dynamic Merchant Solutions.
Get Your Custom Rate
No application or setup fees
No hidden fees
24/7 customer services
In-Person (Average)
1.92%+8¢
Average PIN-Debit Rate 0.91% +8¢

Keyed & Online (Average)

2.38%+25¢

What Our Clients Say
About Dynamic Merchant Solutions.

We’re a leading merchant services company in Los Angeles

Maria Mak

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.
